website_summaries.verdict: Small, crystal hourglass that makes a great gift.
pros: Elegant and affordable, this crystal hourglass looks nice on a desk or mantle
It runs 30 minutes with accuracy, and there are a few sand colors to choose from
cons: Sand may become stuck if kept in a humid environment

customer_reviews.title: Handsome, functional and it's one timepiece guaranteed not to break
customer_reviews.text: I got this to remind myself to get up and move around every 30 minutes when I'm at my computer. It's beautiful, very solid construction and it's an aesthetic addition to my glass desk, iMac desktop and other work station paraphernalia. As a timepiece I don't envision this "breaking".
customer_reviews.author: TechJunkie

customer_reviews.title: well made, beautiful, accurate, and helps kids stick to a timeline.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a Godsend for getting my kids to eat dinner. First of all, it is beautiful. Secondly, it is the best threat I have to make my kids eat their dinner in a timely manner. It is a part of our nightly ritual and has greatly increased the efficiency in which our children finish their meals. If the sand runs out, they go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie B

customer_reviews.title: Very tasteful and elegant with a good amount of weight to it.
customer_reviews.text: The glass looks like and has the weight of crystal. It is really flawless and tasteful. You can only cheapen the gift box by trying to wrap it. The outside of the box is really gorgeous and the inside is satin that caressed the hourglass in such a tasteful pillow of presentation. I would only put it in a bag if I had a big card. The sand is exactly the color shown in the picture. I would call it close to a baby pink. I gave the gift to a sorority sister for her 50th birthday. Pink is one of our colors. It really blew all of the gifts at the party away. She cried.
customer_reviews.author: I wanna tell you

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful and well made Hour Glass!
customer_reviews.text: I must say... I was quite taken back by this product as I didn't expect it to be to beautiful when I got it... but it is! Kinda medium to heavy for its size... but extremely well made. It is a perfect 30 minute timer as I have tested it several times. So relaxing to have on your T.V. stand and watch. I might have to order another color!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: SZAT hourglass sand timer Is a wonderful company to do business with
customer_reviews.text: SZAT hourglass sand timer Is a wonderful company to do business with. .I received my hourglass and it was broken and was replaced within 24 hours. No hassle at all. The company has excellent customer service. I have ordered a second hourglass timer because they are so beautiful. I will be ordering more in the future. Thank you SZAT
customer_reviews.author: Anamaria

customer_reviews.title: as she doesn't like many THINGS
customer_reviews.text: Christmas Present for my mom who is NOTORIOUSLY hard to shop for, as she doesn't like many THINGS. But I wanted to get her something pretty she could open and this fit the bill -- totally affordable and it's even prettier in person. The sand is a really vivid purple and it keeps time accurately. Lovers of time and/or purple and/or outdated methods of calculation, this is for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hourglass for the price
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful, elegant glass hourglass for the price. Mine is supposed to be 30 mins but it's a couple of minutes over, no big deal to me. Symmetry of the glass pillars between the top and bottom is a little off, but then again, not a big deal. Overall it does what it needs to do, it looks gorgeous for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: This 30min (1/2) Hr glass is gorgeous. I have an hour glass in my room and both my sons love it so I ordered them both one of these cuties. One in blue and the other purple. Packaged very nicely. My son's love them.👍👍👍👍👍👌👌👌👌👌
customer_reviews.author: Gale C Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This timer is wonderful,it keeps me on time and it makes no noise hahahahha, perfect way to keep my sessions on time and not disrupt the moment with a noisy alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and petite
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my workplace someone bought it within minutes of me putting it up they liked it so much
customer_reviews.author: Bb Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great timer
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and effective. I bought this as a timer for meetings with my team lead as this person just doesn't know when to leave. This solves the problem!!
customer_reviews.author: DF Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Nice Decoration
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a decoration only to go with the purple decor in my newly remolded bathroom. I live and yes it’s purple not lavender. I saw other reviews saying the timer gets stuck- that might be true.... again I’m using it only as a decoration and I absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Junea

customer_reviews.title: Deceptively cheap. They should charge more for this because it is quality craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as pictured. I bought it for my girlfriend who apparently loves time. It was probably one of the best packaged items i ever bought from amazon. It even came in a decorative box with bubble wrap. You cant beat the quality and price. Its strong and sturdy and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: Tipped over on my table and shattered into pieces very easily. Few days later the debris that I was not able to see/clean up ended up lodged into my foot. Cue blood and foot pain. Luckily I was able to squeeze the little shard out. The product itself was not as vibrant as pictured and it left some specks of dust around the bowl even with all the sand sunk at the bottom. Should've returned it when I had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 Hour Glass
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blue sand and the workmanship and the blue contrast of the sand against the glass is striking. And at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item and packaging , can’t see the sand fall through it though .
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this cake in a beautiful box and item is beautiful. I thought it was broken when I first got it I can’t see the sand going through it . I got it as a gift for my daughter .
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosia

customer_reviews.title: 30 Minutes Timer
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who comes into my cubicle is drawn to this hourglass. It's turns sad faces to smiles for some reason. For some, it means you got 30 minutes of my time! Simply charming.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Nice desktop addition
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to the desktop between two monitors. It serves as a time-sharing reminder: work on one project for 30 minutes, flip, work on another for 30, repeat. About 3 seconds worth of sand seems to stick to the upper globe: a flick of the fingernail and it falls down into the lower half. This is a nicely made accessory and I have to admit to zoning out watching the patterns in the lower half as the sand falls.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Classy
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful! The purple sand gives it a luxury classy look. It’s the perfect size for a work desk accessory.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA WATSON

customer_reviews.title: Work great, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: A must-have timer for kindergarten kids in my house. 30-minutes rotation for them to different activities at home. I bought a lot of timers for two kids to organize their time by themselves. It seems they like this one a lot. We have it for couple months, and it is still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, comes in a very presentable gift box. Very well wrapped up as well inside in bubble wrap. The sand don't follow as fast as, I would like but in all it will be a very nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly, well packaged, and superior quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift for my wife and she just loved it! It was beautifully crafted and purple is my wife’s favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Check accuracy of time piece before tossing packaging out !
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very pretty quality crystal piece...but unfortunately it doesn’t keep accurate time... I have two others time pieces same product maker and they are accurate...
customer_reviews.author: Missy One

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: Even prettier than the picture. Faceted without being gaudy, just enough to catch the light. And the color is beautiful. Well I love purple. Comes well-wrapped in a purple box so lovely I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product, price, and durability.
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter was fascinated by my hourglass which is highly ornate,delicate and not appropriate for a five year old to play with. She’s “all girl” so when I found this lovely pink lucite (half-) hour glass I knew it would be the perfect choice. I gave it to her for her nursery school graduation and she gave it a place of honor on her dresser. Very pleased with the product and price and durability.
customer_reviews.author: nancy gremio

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect. Beautiful and functional. I gave this as a gift to my daughter and she likes it very much. It's more a novelty gift, really, but it's still quite appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Neat Decor
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute trinket for decor. I have it on a shelf at work. I absolutely love it. It's heavy and bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Sellers

customer_reviews.title: NICE PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: This company cares about how their products are shipped, beautiful gift box, very secure package, the hourglass is beautiful, love it.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not functional
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, three packaging was perfect. It does not count down. It gets stuck every minute or so.
customer_reviews.author: Charming Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is beautiful...and the quality of these are amazing...i gave these to a coworker for christmas and she absolutely loved them...ill be ordering 2 more for me.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a meditation timer. Its very solid.

customer_reviews.title: Great look to it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my black oak bookcase. Haven't checked accuracy yet it's mostly for decor, and as a reminder of impermanence.

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Looks as advertised. Attractive packaging, but the colored sand repeatedly gets stuck and fails to run downward. I cannot recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful, nice packaging that would be great as a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, nice packaging that would be great as a gift. However, the sand often gets stuck and stops flowing, so it's not at all reliable as a timer. You have to constantly shake it, But looks good as a decoration, I guess. :-(

customer_reviews.title: Tall And Solid
customer_reviews.text: This hourglass is quite beautiful. I was surprised at the quality. I am very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hourglass
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of this Hourglass, very elegant. Happy about how quickly I received it and very well packaged. Not to mention the price. Bought 4 of them as a gift for Christmas, I'm sure they will love it once they open it. Comes in a nice gift box as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sbas

customer_reviews.title: She was genuinely happy about it
customer_reviews.text: I gave the hourglass as a gift as she collects them. She was genuinely happy about it. Loved the color and style. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: larry e. harms

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's desk. It's very nice quality, looks elegant on her desk and she'll use it to time her reading or homework periods. It's on the large size so make sure you're good with the dimensions.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIZE.  NOT TO BIG AND DEFINITELY NOT SMALL.

customer_reviews.title: I love this sand timer ---- it is packaged beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I love this sand timer ---- it is packaged beautifully, and the item is absolutely breath taking.......it does not keep exact time but that was expected none the less I love it and have been using it to keep myself on track with working my business from my home.....

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice weight, came very well packed
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice weight, came very well packed. Will stand up on carpet as I use it to time meditation sessions. However if your cat decides to rub up against it, it will tip over. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter-in-law who is turning 50 and has everything. Had a hard time on picking a color for the sand as they were all so pretty. It came well-packaged with a attractive inner blue and purple box (purple bow). Nice presentation. The hourglass itself is just as pictured, lovely. You can test the time flow without completely unwrapping it and the time was right on the nose at 30 minutes. Would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Delighted Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Poor. The pink sand will not pass through to ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor. The pink sand will not pass through to the other side when turned over. Had too long before I knew this. Don't think they will take a return or exchange. Will not order another.

customer_reviews.text: This hourglass is stunning! It actually is 30 minutes. These make great gifts and can be used to meditate, time meetings, exercise, and cooking. The sand passing through the center is mesmerizing. I loved it so much I had to buy one! :)

customer_reviews.title: This product was not set to 30 minutes.. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was not set to 30 minutes...I timed it multiple trials and it came to be around 33 minutes. The design of the glasswear resulted in sand layers that didn't fall down unless your shook the sand timer. For the price, I expected a more accurate sand timer as well as one that didn't have design flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Molvig

customer_reviews.title: It came in a beautiful gift box
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely product. It came in a beautiful gift box. The gift box is a gorgeous light blue, appropriate for a male of female. The hourglass is quality. It feels substantial. I have it displayed at work on my desk and get nice comments. I needed something to help increase my productivity and the physical sign of the hourglass with the sand draining away is helping. I am tired of staying late at work and am trying to make use of every minute! The hour glass is functional as well as good looking. I am happy with this product and would order again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: ALL GLASS 30 MINUTES
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed to see this all glass purple hourglass. It is very nice and runs 30 minutes, and it will be a good addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: TN-Will
